ol.li: SHALL conform to Immunizations Section Entries Optional template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.2)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="11369-6" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:9016)

SHALL contain at least one [1..*] entry (CONF:9019, CONF:9020)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Immunization Activity (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.52)
SHALL conform to Immunizations Section Entries Optional template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.2)
